question: What is the theme of the 2019 edition of World Osteoporosis Day (WOD)?
option2: Stop at One: Make your First Break your Last
option3: Love your bones and Protect your future
option4: Real Men Build Their Strength from Within
answer: Love your bones and Protect your future
explanation: The International Osteoporosis Foundation observes the World Osteoporosis Day (WOD) every year on October 20th to raise global awareness on prevention, diagnosis and treatment of osteoporosis and metabolic bone disease. The 2019 theme is ‘Love your bones and Protect your future’.
